title: Bachelor's Simone Ormesher shows off post-baby washboard abs
text:
Former Bachelor star Simone Ormesher welcomed her first child, daughter Gracie-Mae, on October 2.

And on Saturday, the 27-year-old took to Instagram to share a photo of her post-baby washboard abs.

Sporting a pink crop top and green workout shorts, the personal trainer stood inside her kitchen and used the opportunity to plug a protein supplement brand.

How does she do it? The Bachelor's Simone Ormesher, 27, showed off her washboard abs in a crop top and shorts in an Instagram post on Saturday (left), three weeks after giving birth

Simone's semi-straight blonde locks fell around her face and shoulders, and she appeared to go makeup-free.

Holding onto a protein shaker bottle, the star wrote in the caption: 'Forever and always using @tropeaka.'

Fans were amazed with her ability to snap back to her pre-pregnancy shape so soon, with one writing: 'Seriously, did you just have a baby? I was the size of five apartment blocks and still was, after my babies.'

Baby daddy: Simone shares daughter Gracie-Mae with partner Matt Thorne (pictured)

Another said: 'You look absolutely amazing. I am 34 weeks and you are absolute goals for postpartum, girl.'

Simone shares Gracie-Mae with partner Matt Thorne, and has been updating Instagram fans with her postpartum journey.

Three days after giving birth, the blonde told her followers that she will focus on clean eating and easing herself back into a workout regimen.

Updating her fans: Three days after giving birth (pictured), the blonde told her followers that she will focus on clean eating and easing herself back into a workout regimen

'Focusing on clean eating and then [I] will slowly get back into my fitness routine once my mind and body is healed,' she wrote alongside a candid mirror selfie.

Simone rose to fame in 2017, when she was a contestant on Matty Johnson's season of The Bachelor.

She was later invited to star on season one of Bachelor in Paradise, where she had a short-lived romance with Apollo Jackson.
description: Former reality star Simone Ormesher, 27, revealed her toned figure in a crop top and workout shorts, in a photo shared to Instagram on Saturday.
authors: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
